overview: Th Bubble Guppies are discovering all types of jobs - doctors, dentists, waiters, firefighters, and more! Swim into six underwater adventures all about different ways to work AND play with friends! includes episodes: Fishketball! A Tooth On The Looth! Build Me A Building! The Grumpfish Special! Call A Clambulance! Firefighter Gil To The Rescue!
title: Bubble Guppies On The Job
